reviewText: I was just a little dissapointed in the DVD... Basicaslly it verbalized the manual for the most par .. So that is ok ..they did better then the manual . I was hoping for more tutoring in the physical use of it. So in my case a newbee at this tpye of product I was looking fo rmore..I suspect that those that have more experince would be fine.

This is an excellent product made by Roland. This video Training DVD is superb! The instructor's name is David Wills, and he is intimately familiar with this product, as well as many others. I have ordered several of his other DVD's and they are all great!
